Class FeaturedAppBase

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
org.jscience.apps.framework.FeaturedAppBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
App, Viewer
Direct Known Subclasses:
CivilizationApp, CrystalStructureApp, MarketCrashApp, PandemicForecasterApp, QuantumCircuitApp, SmartGridApp, SpinValveApp, TitrationApp
public abstract class FeaturedAppBase extends javafx.application.Application implements App
Abstract base class for all JScience Killer Apps. Provides standard application framework with menus, toolbars, status bar,

  • Nested Class Summary
